import React, {useState} from 'react' import icon from '../../assets/icon.png' const Auth = () => { const {isSignup, setIsSignup}= useState(true) const HandleSwitch=() =>{ setIsSignup(!isSignup) } return (
{ !isSignup && }

{isSignup}

{isSignup ? 'Already have an account?' : 'Don\'t have accout ?' }

) } export default Auth
